flavorText: "I am the ferocity of the Burning Sun. I am hide and feather, fang and claw."

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich bin die Wildheit der Lodernden Sonne. Ich bin Schuppen und Federn, Zähne und Klauen."
foreignData.name: Tilonallis Formwandler
foreignData.text:
Eile
Immer wenn Tilonallis Formwandler angreift, wird er bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer Kopie einer anderen nicht-legendären angreifenden Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: "Yo soy la ferocidad del Sol Ardiente. Yo soy piel y plumas, colmillos y garras".
foreignData.name: Cambiapieles de Tilonalli
foreignData.text:
Prisa.
Siempre que el Cambiapieles de Tilonalli ataque, se convierte en una copia de otra criatura atacante objetivo que no sea legendaria hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « La férocité du Soleil incandescent est en moi. Je suis de peau et de plumes, j'ai des crocs et des griffes. »
foreignData.name: Changepeau de Tilonalli
foreignData.text:
Célérité
À chaque fois que le Changepeau de Tilonalli attaque, il devient une copie d'une autre créature non-légendaire attaquante ciblée jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sono la ferocia del Sole Ardente. Sono pelle e piuma, zanna e artiglio."
foreignData.name: Pellemorfo di Tilonalli
foreignData.text:
Rapidità
Ogniqualvolta il Pellemorfo di Tilonalli attacca, diventa una copia di un'altra creatura attaccante non leggendaria bersaglio fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我は焼熱の太陽の猛り。皮にして羽根、牙にして爪。」
foreignData.name: ティロナーリの肌変わり
foreignData.text:
速攻
ティロナーリの肌変わりが攻撃するたび、伝説でない他の攻撃クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、これはそれのコピーになる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・シャーマン

foreignData.flavorText: "나는 불타는 태양의 흉포함이다. 나는 가죽과 깃털이고, 송곳니와 발톱이다."
foreignData.name: 틸로날리의 둔갑술사
foreignData.text:
신속
틸로날리의 둔갑술사가 공격할 때마다, 전설적이 아닌 다른 공격 중인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 틸로날리의 둔갑술사는 턴종료까지 그 목표의 복사본이 된다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu sou a ferocidade do Sol Ardente. Sou couro e pena, presa e garra."
foreignData.name: Troca-peles de Tilonalli
foreignData.text:
Ímpeto
Toda vez que Troca-peles de Tilonalli ataca, ele se torna uma cópia de outra criatura atacante não lendária alvo até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Я есть ярость Палящего Солнца. Я — это шкура и перья, коготь и клык».
foreignData.name: Оборотень Тилоналли
foreignData.text:
Ускорение
Каждый раз, когда Оборотень Тилоналли атакует, он становится копией другого целевого не являющегося легендарным атакующего существа до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我就是狂野炙阳的化身，披革冠羽，牙尖爪利。」
foreignData.name: 蒂洛纳理变貌师
foreignData.text:
敏捷
每当蒂洛纳理变貌师攻击时，选择另一个目标进行攻击且非传奇的生物。蒂洛纳理变貌师成为该生物的复制品直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我就是狂野炙陽的化身，披革冠羽，牙尖爪利。」
foreignData.name: 蒂洛納理變貌師
foreignData.text:
敏捷
每當蒂洛納理變貌師攻擊時，選擇另一個目標進行攻擊且非傳奇的生物。蒂洛納理變貌師成為該生物的複製品直到回合結束。

name: Tilonalli's Skinshifter
originalText:
Haste
Whenever Tilonalli's Skinshifter attacks, it becomes a copy of another target nonlegendary attacking creature until end of turn.

rulings.text: If the target of the ability of Tilonalli’s Skinshifter becomes an illegal target, Tilonalli’s Skinshifter won’t become a copy of anything. It will remain a 0/1 attacking creature.

Tilonalli’s Skinshifter copies the printed values of the target creature, plus any copy effects that have been applied to it. It won’t copy counters on that creature or effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
Notably, Tilonalli’s Skinshifter won’t copy effects that make a noncreature permanent become a creature. If this causes Tilonalli’s Skinshifter to stop being a creature, it’s removed from combat.
If Tilonalli’s Skinshifter copies a creature that’s copying something else, it will become whatever the target is copying.

If an effect from a resolving spell or ability, such as that of Rallying Roar, begins to apply to Tilonalli’s Skinshifter before it becomes a copy of another creature, that effect will continue to apply.
Because attackers have already been declared, any abilities Tilonalli’s Skinshifter copies that trigger when it or other creatures attack won’t trigger.
Once the ability of Tilonalli’s Skinshifter resolves, its new characteristics don’t change if the characteristics of the copied creature change or if the copied creature leaves the battlefield.
Tilonalli’s Skinshifter remains a copy of the creature through the end step. Damage is removed from it at the same time that it stops being a copy.

text:
